DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the role of nuclear Fibulin-1 (FBLN1) in Human Corneal Fibroblasts under treatment of mitomycin C (MMC).
DOC.brief_title: Function and Modulation of Fibulin-1 Assembly in Nucleus of Corneal Fibroblasts
DOC.criteria: The frozen storage cells in liquid nitrogen were amplified from the residual corneal rim of the donors with more than 20 years old following penetrating keratoplasty. The donors were younger than 20 years old.
